title: Monetary value of ecosystem services in unhealthy seagrass meadows in Indonesia

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 70

Author(s): Nurul Dhewani Mirah Sjafrie, Puji Rahmadi, Triyono Triyono, Fery Kurniawan, Indarto Happy Supriyadi, Firman Zulpikar, Luky Adrianto, Susi Rahmawati, Udhi Eko Hernawan
